snippet: Phoenix acquired Isaiah Thomas, even though it was led last season by Goran Dragic and Eric Bledsoe and then drafted Tyler Ennis.
abstract: Keeping Score column; Phoenix Suns add to their stockpile of star point guards by acquiring Isaiah Thomas in sign-and-trade deal with Sacramento Kings.
lead_paragraph: Phoenix acquired Isaiah Thomas, even though it was led last season by Goran Dragic and Eric Bledsoe and then drafted Tyler Ennis.

headline.main: The Suns’ Stockpile: Another Day, Another Star Point Guard
headline.print_headline: The Suns’ Stockpile: Another Day, Another Star Point Guard
